channel.title: JARING/SIGNING error
channel.description:
java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client/class (wrong name: client) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClassCond(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass0(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Exception: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client/class (wrong name: client)
????? :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused:

item.title: JARING/SIGNING error
item.dc:creator: @microscape microscape
item.description:
@microscape wrote:

i will upload to a professional hoster if it works but… it doesnt… when it loads its just a blank screen

EDIT: all i have to do is JAR and sign it right? then i just copied corruptionX’s webclient data but changed the client jar link to mine…

EDIT2: new error when i tried to fix

java.lang.ClassFormatError: Incompatible magic value 1347093252 in class file client/class
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClassCond(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)

at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Exception: java.lang.ClassFormatError: Incompatible magic value 1347093252 in class file client/class
java.lang.ClassFormatError: Incompatible magic value 1347093252 in class file client/class
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method)

Exception: java.lang.ClassFormatError: Incompatible magic value 1347093252 in class file client/class

EDIT3: ok i fixed the loading problem got rid of compiler and item list etc so it loads fast says something wrong with “magic” click on link above to see it…

item.title: JARING/SIGNING error
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Looks like the HTML Applet/batch code is trying to load the main class as client/class when it should just be client.
EDIT: Or when you jarred it you set the main class as client/class.

Read full topic
